category.name: NSDate(ShellKit)

abstract.p: Gets a string representing the elapsed time since now

result.p: A string representing the elasped time

desc.p: If less than a second, the elapsed time will be represented in milliseconds (ms). If less that a minute, it will be represented in seconds (s). If less than an hour, it will be represented in minutes (m). Otherwise, it will be represented in hours (h).
